items.title: Lectric cuts e-bike accessories as low as $67: Pet trailer, coolers, buddy seat, more
items.summary:
As part of Lectric’s Valentine’s Day e-bike sale, the popular e-mobility brand is also offering up to 15% discounts on select add-on accessories for your ride, like the Pet Trailer for $169 shipped, bringing it down from its full $199 price tag. We’ve previously seen this trailer go as low as $152 back during the brand’s Christmas stocking stuffer sale, with prices otherwise having been seen keeping above $179 when offered discounts, making this the second-best deal you can score it with. This handy little trailer is a great addition if you love taking your furry friends along with you, allowing you to safely shepherd them to parks, appointments, and beyond. It features durable waterproof mesh fabric walls with a zippable opening at the top, as well as an easy-access zipper opening at the front window (plus a plastic cover there). One thing to note if you want to connect it to the Lectric XP Trikes, specifically, is that you’ll also need this hitch and tow bar that is sold separately. Head below to see the full lineup of Valentine’s Day accessory deals, and be sure to also shop the Lectric Valentine’s Day e-bike deals here.

more…

As part of its short-term January Monthly Madness Sale that is closing out the month, EcoFlow has also launched a 48-hour flash sale that is seeing up to 66% discounts on three different units, with things starting lowest on the DELTA 3 Classic Portable Power Station at $399 shipped, matching its current Amazon pricing. While you may spy it carrying a $599 MSRP directly from the brand, and occasionally reaching that high price at Amazon, you’re more likely to find it floating down around $429 on average. While we have seen it go as low as $377 during Black Friday, as well as a one-time $349 low for a single day in early November, you’re still looking at a solid extra $30 cut from its usual going rate ($200 off the MSRP) that lands it at the third-best price we have tracked. Head below to shop the other flash offers before they end tomorrow night, January 30. You can also shop the full EcoFlow January Monthly Madness Sale lineup in our original coverage here.

items.title: Fall in love with your commute and up to $750 savings during Lectric’s Valentine’s Day e-bike sale – all from $999
items.summary:
With February being a month to celebrate love, along with other things, Lectric has launched its 2026 Valentine’s Day Sale that is seeing up to $753 savings across its long-range e-bike models, as well as some of the standard models. Amongst the many models I’ve been fortunate enough to ride from Lectric, my love is the highest for the XP4 750 Folding Utility e-bike that comes with $409 in FREE gear at $1,299 shipped, while the standard XP4 Folding Utility e-bikes get $79 bundles at $999 shipped. You’d have to shell out $1,708 and $1,078 for these bundle packages without any savings, but as you’re likely aware by now, Lectric regularly offers its discounts on the bundled gear rather than the e-bike’s price tags. The standard models are getting a single LevelUp Rack with their purchase, while the long-range 750 models are also getting an Elite headlight upgrade, a suspension seat post, an accordion-style folding bike lock, a phone mount, and a pair of adjustable mirrors. Head below to see the full lineup of deals while they last.
